headline: 2 Growth Stocks to Invest $1,000 in Right Now
summary: Growth stocks run into hard times just like other stocks, which can be a good time to buy them.  Pool Corp. has a business that is inherently biased toward growth.  Hershey is dealing with a big headwind, but it is likely to overcome the issue over time.
